data.name: finPartidaFelicitacionLeyenda
data.value: Congratulations to the player who has cunningly and cruelly driven everyone else to the brink of despair. Victory is yours!

data.name: finPartidaMiniLeyenda
data.value: The voice of destiny has spoken and I have answered, I have won

data.name: historiaAbelith
data.value: A conjurer skilled in summoning and controlling spirits uses his knowledge to negotiate with supernatural entities, often at a high cost to the living.

data.name: historiaAngelus
data.value: The queen, cunning and manipulative, uses her charm to conceal her true cruel nature and control the nobles.

data.name: historiaArialyn
data.value: An enigmatic lady who controls the shadows manipulates darkness for her own ends, creating confusion and fear in those who cross her path.

data.name: historiaAris
data.value: A lone warrior of great skill seeks vengeance for a past betrayal, traveling the world in search of justice with his imposing sword.

data.name: historiaDidorian
data.value: An ancient alchemist, consumed by his quest for immortality, now conducts dark experiments in his isolated tower, surrounded by monsters of his own creation.

data.name: historiaGaia
data.value: A powerful sorceress connected to nature uses her abilities to protect the ancient forests, though her power can become lethal against those who threaten her home.

data.name: historiaLorenzeo
data.value: A military leader with demonic strength ravages cities and collects souls to feed his dark power while seeking to conquer everything in his path.

data.name: historiaLuan
data.value: The king, known for his tyranny and cruelty, rules through fear and oppression.

data.name: historiaLusiel
data.value: The crown prince, arrogant and contemptuous, enjoys abusing his power and causing chaos.

data.name: historiaMerit
data.value: The matriarch, known for her sarcasm and lack of patience, handles internal affairs with a firm hand and manipulates others to maintain control.

data.name: historiaNeferu
data.value: The eldest daughter, a ruthless warrior who enjoys causing pain in battle. Her rude attitude and lack of respect make her a feared figure on the battlefield.

data.name: historiaPablian
data.value: A bard corrupted by dark powers uses his music to sow discord and destruction across the realms while concealing his true intentions.

data.name: historiaSeti
data.value: The patriarch of the family, Seti is a man of iron will and a cold heart. His ability to manipulate and his excessive ambition have earned him the respect of his followers, but also the hatred of his enemies.

data.name: historiaSobek
data.value: The youngest son, clumsy but unpredictable. His erratic behavior makes him an unexpected and dangerous threat at court, using chaos to his advantage.

data.name: historiaTucani
data.value: The princess, unpredictable and vengeful, creates unrest with her erratic behavior and lack of compassion.

data.name: historiaZael
data.value: A lethal and treacherous assassin uses his ability to move through the shadows and his dark artifact to bring chaos and death without leaving a trace.

data.name: inicioInstruccionInvitado
data.value: To access all the features you have to register

data.name: instruccionSeleccionarFoto
data.value: Select the picture if you want to change it

data.name: mensajeExp01
data.value: This username has already been registered, please choose another.

data.name: mensajeExp02
data.value: This email is already registered, please try another.

data.name: mensajeExp03
data.value: We couldn't find an account with that email and password. Please double-check your spelling or create a new account by clicking "Register".

data.name: mensajeExp04
data.value: Este usuario ya es amigo suyo

data.name: mensajeExp05
data.value: A request has already been sent to this player, please wait for their response

data.name: mensajeExp06
data.value: To add a friend, you must select the profile of another person. Make sure to send the request to someone else.

data.name: mensajeExp07
data.value: You haven't selected a player to send a request to.

data.name: mensajeExp10
data.value: No room was found with that code or id. Please verify that the information is correct.

data.name: mensajeExp10054
data.value: The network connection was interrupted, please contact a system administrator and try again later.

data.name: mensajeExp10060
data.value: Connection timeout, please contact a system administrator and try again later.

data.name: mensajeExp11
data.value: The email entered is invalid. It must be between 3 and 255 characters, with no more than two consecutive spaces, and follow the format(user@domain.com.)

data.name: mensajeExp11001
data.value: Incorrect SQL server name, please contact a system administrator and try again later.

data.name: mensajeExp12
data.value: You have not yet selected a profile picture.

data.name: mensajeExp15
data.value: All playeres have to choose a character

data.name: mensajeExp16
data.value: The server couldn't connect all the players

data.name: mensajeExp17
data.value: The room isn't full yet, please wait for other players

data.name: mensajeExp18
data.value: Your server connection timed out. Please try again later

data.name: mensajeExp18456
data.value: Authentication error in the database, please contact a system administrator and try again later.

data.name: mensajeExp19
data.value: You haven't selected a character yet. Please choose a character before proceeding

data.name: mensajeExp53
data.value: Cannot find the SQL server, please contact a system administrator and try again later.

data.name: mensajeExp54060
data.value: Unable to open the database, please contact a system administrator and try again later.

data.name: mensajeRegistroJugadorFallido
data.value: An error occurred while registering, please try again

data.name: mensajeSolcitudEnviadaExito
data.value: Your friend request has been sent successfully.

data.name: resultadoAmistad
data.value: The players that match the search are

data.name: salaDescripcionCorbat
data.value: They are a feared and powerful family, each member mastering a dark aspect of magic and war. United by their boundless ambition and thirst for power, the Corbat family has become an unstoppable force, leaving destruction in their wake.

data.name: salaDescripcionGarlo
data.value: The Garlo family is known in Garloth for their oppressive rule and their feared reputation throughout the realm.

data.name: salaDescripcionOres
data.value: They are a powerful and feared family, each member wielding their own mastery over the dark arts. United by their ambition and a legacy of shadows, the Nocturnis family has woven a web of terror across the realms, seeking to expand their malignant influence.

data.name: salaDescripcionRamfez
data.value: The Ramfez family is known in Eldoria for their feared and despised reputation, wielding power through intrigue and cruelty.

data.name: solicitudAmistadInstruccion
data.value: Click the ‘more’ button to accept the request.

data.name: votacionInstruccion
data.value: Select what you want to do, vote to remove

data.name: mensajeExp08
data.value: This room name is already taken, please try entering a different name.

data.name: mensajeExp22
data.value: There was a problem with the server. Please check your network connection and try again.
